titleText: Who is the creator of Linux?

clues.clue1: A certain blanket-loving character in Peanuts shares his name
clues.clue2: This person can be a bit candid with his opinions
clues.clue3: They are also credited for inventing the Git version control system

titleText: Here is a really long question title text that doesn't really mean anything. But I have to type a long time. What is the best sport?

clues.clue1: This sport can get a little chilly
clues.clue2: Only one position is allowed to actually catch the object meant for scoring
clues.clue3: The championship trophy is one of the most revered in the entire sports landscape
